other_tests.findings: An 8-mm appendicolith and free fluid suggestive of a perforated appendicitis with discontinuity of the appendiceal wall. Dilated contrast-filled loops of small bowel measuring at least 4.7 cm and mild dilation of colonic loops measuring 4.1 cm. No evidence for obstruction. No free air or significant pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy noted.
